newsitem.title: USA: U.S. to sell $26 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills Oct 15.
newsitem.headline: U.S. to sell $26 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills Oct 15.

text.p: The Treasury Department said on Tuesday it will auction $26 billion of three- and six-month bills on Oct 15 to raise $1.125 billion as $24.877 billion of bills are maturing.
The weekly bill sale will be equally divided between the two maturities. The bills will be issued Oct 17. The three-month bills mature January 16 and the six-month bills mature April 17.
The CUSIP number for the three-month bills is 9127943V4 and for the six-month bills is 9127944F8.
